articles.author: Nicole Winfield
articles.title: Pope Leo XIV offers message of unity for polarized Catholic Church as pontificate officially starts - AP News
articles.description: Pope Leo XIV has vowed to work for unity so that the Catholic Church becomes a sign of peace in the world. The 69-year-old Augustinian missionary is history's first American pope. He offered a message of communion during an inaugural Mass on Sunday in St. Pet…
articles.content: VATICAN CITY (AP) Pope Leo XIV vowed Sunday to work for unity in a polarized Catholic Church and world, as historys first American pope offered a message of healing during an inaugural Mass in St. Pe… [+8189 chars]
